name: Half-Metal
description:
The world has been overtaken by robots! Escape from their metallic prison floor-by-floor with your newfound cybernetic enhancements. 

Destroy robots, sneak past turrets, and collect powerful ammunition in this NES-style adventure complete with over 50 levels of puzzles, stealth action, and cool pixel explosions.

Face the machines in Half-Metal!

Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow keys or WASD
  • Shoot: Space bar
  • Switch Ammo / Select in Menus: X key
  • Pause: Enter key
  • Reset Level: Q key

Developed in HomeTeamGameDev Lighthouse
